subject: Re: [junit] Concurrent tests
msgSnippet: In the case of Fixtures you would run into shared access problems where concurrently running tests would be accessing and updating the same variables.  Maybe
messageBody:
In the case of Fixtures you would run into shared
access problems where concurrently running tests would
be accessing and updating the same variables. Maybe
you could split this Testcase into smaller test cases.

--- Mark Richards <mrichards@...> wrote:
> Is there any way to run multiple tests concurrently
> in one JUnit session?
> We currently have >250 tests and it takes a long
> time to run them
> sequentially, however some of the tests could be run
> concurrently without
> impacting correctness or performance. Does JUnit
> support this, and if not,
> would it be hard to add?
>
> Mark Richards
>
